configuration.Comment: This file is used to build the configuration part of the frontend. This is done at run-time, so errors here might prevent the frontend from running.

preference.name: Vic2Mods
preference.description: Vic2 mods to use for conversion (mods require manual conversion)

preference.name: HoI4VersionMethod
preference.description: The method the converter uses to set the HoI4 version

entryOption.name: hardcoded
entryOption.description: Use the HoI4 version hard coded into the converter (1.4.2)

entryOption.name: automatic
entryOption.description: Attempt to automatically detect the installed HoI4 version

preference.name: HoI4Version
preference.description: If manually entering the HoI4 version, set this to the desired version

preference.name: industrial_shape_factor
preference.description: How much to balance countries' industry to each other. 1.0 = fully balanced, 0.0 = no balancing

preference.name: ic_factor
preference.description: How much to make the world's industry match default HoI4 industry. 1.0 = fully matched, 0.0 = no matching

preference.name: manpower_factor
preference.description: Used to increase or decrease the total amount of manpower in the world.

preference.name: force_multiplier
preference.description: Controls how many HoI4 divisions are created.

preference.name: ideologies
preference.description: Which ideologies end up in the conversion

entryOption.name: keep_all
entryOption.description: Keep all ideologies (democratic, fascist, communist, absolutist, radical).

preference.name: remove_cores
preference.description: Should some cores be removed during conversion

entryOption.name: true
entryOption.description: Remove cores that should be removed.

entryOption.name: false
entryOption.description: Don't remove cores that should be removed.

preference.name: debug
preference.description: Whether or not to output a debug mod
